content: nov 24 updateds charts updated ------------------------------------------------- this tee is knitted from bottom to top it s knitted in circular for the body and separate front and back piece at the arm hole and then work in flat front and back pieces are seamed together at the shoulder top and then pick up and finish the neck and sleeves s m l xl xxl sample in size m bust circumference of the garment 112 120 128 136 144 cm/ 44 47 50 54 57 would suggest about 20cm/8 positive ease for the bust size that the shoulder of the tee will drop in good shape body length 49 50 51 52 53 cm/ 19 3 19 7 20 1 20 5 20 9 7 7 8 8 9 skeins
